org.lenskit.util.collections

Class SortedListAccumulator<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lenskit.util.collections.SortedListAccumulator<T>

  • public abstract class SortedListAccumulator<T>
extends Object

    Accumulators for sorted lists of things.

    • Method Detail

      • decreasing

        public static <T extends Comparable<? super T>> SortedListAccumulator<T> decreasing(int n)

        Create a new sorted list accumulator.

        Parameters:
        n - The number of results desired; negative for unlimited.
        Returns:
        An accumulator accumulator.

      • decreasing

        public static <T> SortedListAccumulator<T> decreasing(int n,
                                                      Comparator<? super T> comp)

        Create a new sorted list accumulator that sorts in decreasing order.

        Parameters:
        n - The number of results desired; negative for unlimited.
        comp - The comparator; items will be picked in decreasing order by this comparator.
        Returns:
        An accumulator accumulator.

      • add

        public abstract void add(@Nonnull
                         T x)

        Add an item to the accumulator.

        Parameters:
        x - The item to add.

      • finish

        public abstract List<T> finish()

        Finish accumulating and return the accumulated items.

        When this method is called, the accumulator is reset and can be used to accumulate a fresh set of items.

        Returns:
        The accumulated items.
